content.text: Match ends, Newcastle United 0, West Bromwich Albion 1.
Second Half ends, Newcastle United 0, West Bromwich Albion 1.
Attempt missed. Jake Livermore (West Bromwich Albion) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Hal Robson-Kanu (West Bromwich Albion) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Jamaal Lascelles (Newcastle United).
Substitution, West Bromwich Albion. Hal Robson-Kanu replaces Salomón Rondón.
Foul by Jacob Murphy (Newcastle United).
Salomón Rondón (West Bromwich Albion) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, West Bromwich Albion. Jonny Evans replaces James McClean.
Attempt missed. Kenedy (Newcastle United) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Florian Lejeune.
Attempt missed. Joselu (Newcastle United) header from the left side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by DeAndre Yedlin with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by Allan Nyom.
Offside, West Bromwich Albion. Salomón Rondón tries a through ball, but Matt Phillips is caught offside.
James McClean (West Bromwich Albion) is shown the yellow card.
Foul by Grzegorz Krychowiak (West Bromwich Albion).
Matt Ritchie (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
